Name: Jentrix's Group
description:
Jentrix is 40 years old and has five children. She has been a farmer for 12 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Jentrix is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group, formed by six farmers in Kimilili District, Kenya.

Jentrix started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2012, and decided to do so because she wanted to earn enough to feed her family. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to be more active in her community.

Jentrixâ€™s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 3.25 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of six solar lights.
